Text: You always amazes me! thanks a lot. BTW, do you have any good ebook about how to make good ebooks? I want to start sharing good stuff in spanish. Best regards from Costa Rica!
Could you uL a book dealing with CTS caused by leaving 'thank you's' for the 1000's of gr8 uLs that you do?
Thank you. This book is the one I am looking for!!
Out here in the boonies it is worth a look or two.. I'll post my experience with it..
